mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS no, m.* FROM member m, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE employ='N' ORDER BY name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(name, gender, birth, phone, email, post, addr, status) VALUES (#{name }, #{gender}, #{birth }, #{phone }, #{email }, #{post }, #{addr }, '입학')
